name: BadDool
description:
A NEW DECK BUILDING EXPERIENCE

Experience an all-new deck-building thrill in BadDool! Prepare to conquer ever-changing dungeons, ensuring every playthrough unveils a brand-new adventure.

A new way of experiencing combat

Engage in combat like never before with our innovative system blending cards and strategic prowess. Utilize your gathered cards to battle foes, strategizing each move. Every fourth second is a crucial card-play moment, unleashing attacks or deploying maneuvers to evade danger and outwit your adversaries.

Explore our auto generate dungeons

Embark on dungeon exploration in BadDool's randomly generated labyrinths, teeming with loot, enemies, and challenging bosses. Embrace the unpredictability that fuels replayability, delivering a fresh, exhilarating experience with every setback, ensuring the game remains endlessly engaging.

Friends or foes?

Meet an extensive array of NPCs boasting rich lore and vibrant personalities. These characters breathe life into BadDool, offering opportunities to forge alliances or become formidable adversaries. Your choices ripple through the game, shaping your journey in this immersive world!
